item.title: Free Question No.1
item.description: a. Assume that the length and width of a rectangle can be only whole numbers. How many rectangles of different dimensions have a perimeter of 12? 14? 16? 18? 24? (Orientation of the rectangle does not matter; that is, a 2x3 is the same rectangle as a 3x2.)
